reviewText: My Marine father is a Purple Heart Veteran who served and was wounded at Tarawa.  I surprised him with this video and he was very grateful for it.  He recalled the battle as though it was yesterday.  He added many anecdotes that he recalled and at the end, he was somewhat tearful and quiet.  I have always been proud of my father, but this film gave me even greater respect for the valor he had shown and qualities he in his children.
